title: Shabty of Ankhesenmut
description:
Faience shabty of Anh-s'-n-Mw.t. Body and face now green, probably originally blue. Arms crossed with hoe in each hand. Wig and details of face black. Inscribed in single column down front of body. Routine work. 
Condition: Glaze badly worn.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
